name: totally normal memory card game nothing to see here
name_original: totally normal memory card game nothing to see here
description:
!!!IMPORTANT: PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN. THE TEXT GETS ALL WEIRD WHEN YOU DON'T OK COOL I DON'T KNOW WHY I'M STILL SHOUTING OKAY THEN.!!!

A slightly rushed game I made for The Community Game Jam although I'm proud of it nonetheless. The past 2 days have been pretty crazy as I was sick for a few days and I only had time on the last 2 days. But I still consider it my most fun to play game and I had a lot of fun making it!

Hope you enjoy! I'm open to constructive criticism so please comment if you enjoyed, and what you liked/disliked.

Oh and epilepsy warning too.
